verses.verse: Let every <WG3956> soul <WG5590> be subject <WG5293> to the higher <WG5242> powers. <WG1849> For there is no <WG3756> power <WG1849> but of God: <WG2316> the powers <WG1849> that be are ordained <WG5021> of God. <WG2316>

Whoever <WG3588> therefore <WG5620> resists <WG498> the power, <WG1849> resists <WG436> the ordinance <WG1296> of God: <WG2316> and they that resist <WG436> shall receive <WG2983> to themselves <WG1438> damnation. <WG2917>

For rulers <WG758> are not a terror <WG5401> to good <WG18> works, <WG2041> but to the evil. <WG2556> Will <WG2309> you then <WG1161> not be afraid <WG5399> of the power? <WG1849> do <WG4160> that which is good, <WG18> and you shall have <WG2192> praise <WG1868> of the same: <WG846>

For he is the minister <WG1249> of God <WG2316> to you for good. <WG18> But if <WG1437> you do <WG4160> that which is evil, <WG2556> be afraid; <WG5399> for he bears <WG5409> not the sword <WG3162> in vain: <WG1500> for he is the minister <WG1249> of God, <WG2316> a revenger <WG1558> to execute wrath <WG3709> on him that does <WG4238> evil. <WG2556>
Why <WG1352> you must needs <WG318> be subject, <WG5293> not only <WG3440> for wrath, <WG3709> but also <WG2532> for conscience <WG4893> sake.

For for this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> pay <WG5055> you tribute <WG5411> also: <WG2532> for they are God's <WG2316> ministers, <WG3011> attending <WG4342> continually <WG4342> on this <WG5124> very <WG846> thing.

Render <WG591> therefore <WG3767> to all <WG3956> their dues: <WG3782> tribute <WG5411> to whom <WG3588> tribute <WG5411> is due; <WG514> custom <WG5056> to whom <WG3588> custom; <WG5056> fear <WG5401> to whom <WG3588> fear; <WG5401> honor <WG5092> to whom <WG3588> honor. <WG5092>
Owe <WG3784> no <WG3367> man <WG3367> any <WG3367> thing, but to love <WG25> one <WG240> another: <WG240> for he that loves <WG25> another <WG2087> has fulfilled <WG4137> the law. <WG3551>

For this, <WG3588> You shall not commit <WG3431> adultery, <WG3431> You shall not kill, <WG5407> You shall not steal, <WG2813> You shall not bear <WG5576> false <WG5576> witness, <WG5576> You shall not covet; <WG1937> and if <WG1487> there be any <WG1536> other <WG2087> commandment, <WG1785> it is briefly <WG346> comprehended <WG346> in this <WG5129> saying, <WG3056> namely, <WG1722> You shall love <WG25> your neighbor <WG4139> as yourself. <WG1438>
Love <WG26> works <WG2038> no <WG3756> ill <WG2556> to his neighbor: <WG4139> therefore <WG3767> love <WG26> is the fulfilling <WG4138> of the law. <WG3551>

And that, knowing <WG1492> the time, <WG2540> that now <WG2236> it is high time <WG5610> to awake <WG1453> out of sleep: <WG5258> for now <WG3568> is our salvation <WG4991> nearer <WG1452> than <WG2228> when <WG3753> we believed. <WG4100>

The night <WG3571> is far spent, <WG4298> the day <WG2250> is at <WG1448> hand: <WG1448> let us therefore <WG3767> cast <WG656> off <WG659> the works <WG2041> of darkness, <WG4655> and let us put <WG1746> on <WG1746> the armor <WG3696> of light. <WG5457>

Let us walk <WG4043> honestly, <WG2156> as in the day; <WG2250> not in rioting <WG2970> and drunkenness, <WG3178> not in chambering <WG2845> and wantonness, <WG766> not in strife <WG2054> and envying. <WG2205>
But put <WG1746> you on <WG1746> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and make <WG4160> not provision <WG4307> for the flesh, <WG4561> to fulfill the lusts <WG1939> thereof.
